summary: AN ORDINANCE reappropriating, to promote energy conservation and enhance rate assistance, business taxes received from Seattle City Light as a result of the increased electricity rates; increasing expenditure allowances in the 2001 budgets of the Human Services Department, the Mayor's Office for Senior Citizens, the Office of Sustainability and Environment, Seattle Transportation, and Seattle City Light by the reduction, transfer and reappropriation of the appropriation previously made for energy conservation and rate assistance in the Department of Finance General; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
